Hymn.Arabic: سمع الرب فرحمني. الرب صار لي عونًا.
Hymn.English: 10 Hear, O Lord, and have mercy on me; Lord, be my helper!

Hymn.Arabic: رددت نوحي إلي فرح لي. مزقت مسحي ومنطقتني سرورًا: هللويا.
Hymn.English: 11 You have turned for me my mourning into dancing; You have put off my sackcloth and clothed me with gladness,.     Alleluia
